name: coursera_scrape_reviews
description: Scrape reviews from a Coursera course page. Returns learner reviews with rating, content, author, date, and helpfulness count.

steps.code: const reviews = []; const reviewEls = document.querySelectorAll('[class*="review"][class*="card"], [data-testid="review"], [class*="Review"]'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(reviewEls.length, 20); i++) { const el = reviewEls[i]; const ratingEl = el.querySelector('[class*="rating"] span, [class*="stars"], [aria-label*="star"]'); const contentEl = el.querySelector('[class*="review-text"], [class*="body"] p, [class*="content"]'); const authorEl = el.querySelector('[class*="reviewer"], [class*="author"], [class*="name"]'); const dateEl = el.querySelector('time, [class*="date"], [class*="timestamp"]'); const helpfulEl = el.querySelector('[class*="helpful"] span, [class*="votes"]'); if (contentEl && contentEl.textContent.trim().length > 0) { reviews.push({ rating: ratingEl ? (ratingEl.getAttribute('aria-label') || ratingEl.textContent.trim()) : '', content: contentEl.textContent.trim().substring(0, 500), author: authorEl ? authorEl.textContent.trim() : 'Anonymous', date: dateEl ? (dateEl.getAttribute('datetime') || dateEl.textContent.trim()) : '', helpful: helpfulEl ? helpfulEl.textContent.trim() : '' }); } } const overallEl = document.querySelector('[class*="overall-rating"], [class*="average-rating"]'); const totalEl = document.querySelector('[class*="review-count"], [class*="total-reviews"]'); return { overall_rating: overallEl ? overallEl.textContent.trim() : '', total_reviews: totalEl ? totalEl.textContent.trim() : '', scraped_count: reviews.length, reviews: reviews, url: window.location.href }
